titleStmt.title: A Table of the cheiffest citties, and townes in England, as they ly [sic] from London and the distance of miles, howe a man may travill from London to any of them or from any of them to London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Walter Dight, at the signe of the Harpe in shoo-lane,

notesStmt.note: Woodcut with letterpress heading and imprint.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: the signe of the Harpe in shoo-lane
